title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Deaf / Hearing Loss
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Deaf / Hearing Loss              Deaf / Hearing Loss       For People With Hearing Impairments: A printed, self-guided walking tour, entitled Mill Mile is available for download at millmile.com, or in limited printed quantities available from your guide or at the Paterson Museum. This walking tour follows the guided tour route.
